sentences.sentence: AOX (adsorbable organic halogen) was an important signal of artificial pollution.
sentences.translation: 可吸附有机卤化物(AOX)是人为污染的重要标志之一。

sentences.sentence: Indigo shows the similar adsorbable performance to the three kinds of protein as Langmuir's.
sentences.translation: 靛蓝对三种酶蛋白的吸附和朗格·缪尔吸附大致吻合。
